Line17.BD31C: I have what you seek. You hunger for knowledge. You dragged your child all over Sanctuary in pursuit of it.
Line23.B6582: No, I...I taught her how to survive!
Line25.BD31C: Is that what you want to believe? Drop the act. You have questions, I have answers. I know the fabric of the cosmos.
Line27.BAE4: Your mother is...alive. She came this way with Lilith.
Line3.B6582: Everything I’ve read has warned me against you.
Line31.BAE4: Er, sometimes I see visions of the past. I saw them.
Line35.BD31C: You've read so much, yet know so little. Will you accept my offer?
Line37.B6582: I...I don’t know. Will you let me try? I want to try.
Line39.BAE4: Lilith’s petals. Her blood was fed to me, once.
Line5.BD31C: How your mind races. Yes, I am Lilith. Mother of Sanctuary.
MenuLabel: Underworld - Red Ghost Lilith and Vhenard Chat 1
